content.prompt: The metaphors in the fifth and sixth paragraphs (“the gyre he had been circling,” “the lodestone of his heart,” and “the heart of the sun”) all serve to convey the

choices.label: intensity of Jackson’s feelings for a place
lack of clarity Jackson has about where to live
antipathy Jackson feels for all things English

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
